titles.title: A resolution proclaiming the week of May 21 through May 27, 2006, as "National Public Works Week".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 5/11/2006--Passed Senate without amendment. Proclaims the week of May 21-May 27, 2006, as National Public Works Week. Recognizes the contributions that public works professionals make every day to improve U.S. public infrastructure and the communities that they serve.
